name: Cunning Creation
description:
This is my first Game Jam and I am proud to submit what I have created, its not the best and it's really no where near perfect, but it's mine and I gave the best effort I could in the time given.

I want to thank everyone to tries it out and I would also love feedback if possible on how I can improve my game development skills.

I am grateful for the chance to show my abilities in this field and eventually hope to turn computer programming into a job.
